de.javakaffee.web.msm
Class NodeIdService

java.lang.Object
  de.javakaffee.web.msm.NodeIdService

public class NodeIdService
extends java.lang.Object

Provides services related to node ids.

isNodeAvailable

public boolean isNodeAvailable(java.lang.String nodeId)
Determines, if the given nodeId is available.

Parameters:
nodeId - the node to check, not null.
Returns:
true, if the node is marked as available

setNodeAvailable

public void setNodeAvailable(java.lang.String nodeId,
                             boolean available)
Mark the given nodeId as available as specified.

Parameters:
nodeId - the nodeId to update
available - specifies if the node was abailable or not

getAvailableNodeId

public java.lang.String getAvailableNodeId(java.lang.String nodeId)
Get an available (randomly selected) memcached node id for session backup. The active node ids are preferred, if no active node id is left to try, a failover node id is picked. If no failover node id is left, this method returns just null.

Parameters:
nodeId - the unavailable nodeId which is used to start checking other nodes.
Returns:
a nodeId if any available node was found, otherwise null.

getNextNodeId

protected java.lang.String getNextNodeId(java.lang.String nodeId,
                                         java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> nodeIds)
Determines (randomly) an available node id from the provided node ids. The returned node id will be different from the provided nodeId and will be available according to the local NodeAvailabilityCache.

Parameters:
nodeId - the original id
nodeIds - the node ids to choose from
Returns:
an available node or null

getMemcachedNodeId

public java.lang.String getMemcachedNodeId()
Get the next random, available node id. If no node is available, null is returned.

Returns:
a nodeId or null.
